title: Natural Language Processing (NLP): Teaching Machines to Understand Language
objective: Exploring how AI systems are trained to understand, interpret, and generate human language.
content: Natural Language Processing (NLP) focuses on enabling computers to understand, interpret, and generate human language. NLP powers applications like chatbots, translation tools, and voice assistants. Techniques include tokenization, stemming, and named entity recognition, allowing machines to process language at various levels. NLP continues to evolve, driven by advances in deep learning and large-scale language models.
